quote: I guarantee you, they had the conversation where he basically said, "Mrs. Lynch, call your attack dog off. We’ve killed people. We killed Vince Foster. We destroyed Webb Hubbell. We will destroy you." And then what happens to things? All of a sudden — well, she did it, yeah, it was all terrible, don’t know who got the information, very classified. But no indictment.
quotePlain: I guarantee you, they had the conversation where he basically said, “Mrs. Lynch, call your attack dog off. We’ve killed people. We killed Vince Foster. We destroyed Webb Hubbell. We will destroy you.” And then what happens to things? All of a sudden — well, she did it, yeah, it was all terrible, don’t know who got the information, very classified. But no indictment.
name: Pete Olson

checks.quote: There’s no evidence of Clinton saying as much nor a factual basis for anyone to say the Clintons killed Foster. This claim, which Olson backed off after it became widely known, adds up to a baseless accusation.
checks.quotePlain: There’s no evidence of Clinton saying as much nor a factual basis for anyone to say the Clintons killed Foster. This claim, which Olson backed off after it became widely known, adds up to a baseless accusation.

claims.title: Bill Clinton told Loretta Lynch that the Clintons have killed
claims.negative: Bill Clinton did not tell Loretta Lynch that the Clintons have killed
claims.negativePlain: Bill Clinton did not tell Loretta Lynch that the Clintons have killed
claims.truth: There is no evidence for this.
claims.truthPlain: There is no evidence for this.
